LanguageData.Sandbags.label: sandbags
LanguageData.Sandbags.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand held in place by steel rods. Sandbags are ugly, but provide excellent cover from ranged attacks.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Sandbags.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Sandbags.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.description: A small, short-ranged automatic turret. Requires steel to replace its barrel after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Turret_MiniTurret.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Turret_MiniTurret.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.label: autocannon turret
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: A heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but it requires frequent and expensive barrel changes. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Turret_Autocannon.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Turret_Autocannon.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Bullet_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon shell
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.description: A self-loading large-bore cannon designed to attach to a turret.
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.label: sniper turret
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.description: A very long-ranged automatic sniper turret. Its high-velocity uranium shells do heavy damage over very long ranges, but it requires frequent and expensive barrel changes. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up. May explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Turret_Sniper.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Turret_Sniper.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Bullet_TurretSniper.label: sniper shell
LanguageData.Gun_TurretSniper.label: sniper cannon
LanguageData.Gun_TurretSniper.description: A self-loading sniper cannon designed to attach to a turret. Precise at range, it's not good at tracking close targets.
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.description: A manned mortar that launches all kinds of shells. While it can inflict devastating damage, the mortar's inherent inaccuracy makes it more useful for attacking large fortifications than groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Turret_Mortar.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Turret_Mortar.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Turret_Mortar.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.label: deadfall trap
LanguageData.TrapDeadfall.description: A suspended spiked weight held up by a delicate trigger. When the victim disturbs the trigger, the weight is released and falls on his head or torso.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapDeadfall.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapDeadfall.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive.label: IED trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_HighExplosive.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. Wild animals will avoid these.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapIED_HighExplosive.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapIED_HighExplosive.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary.label: IED incendiary trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_Incendiary.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable. Wild animals will avoid these.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapIED_Incendiary.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapIED_Incendiary.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP.label: IED EMP trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_EMP.description: A simple trap consisting of an EMP shell and a homemade trigger. The explosion can paralyze mechanoids for a few seconds. Can be triggered even by those who are unaffected by EMP explosions. Wild animals will avoid these.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapIED_EMP.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapIED_EMP.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam.label: IED firefoam trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_Firefoam.description: When someone touches the trigger, the trap explodes and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam around itself. Wild animals will avoid these.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapIED_Firefoam.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapIED_Firefoam.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.label: IED antigrain warhead trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.description: A high-tech antigraing warhead connected to a homemade trigger. When triggered, the antigrain warhead detonates, creating a massive antimatter explosion. Wild animals will avoid these.
LanguageData.Blueprint_TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_TrapIED_AntigrainWarhead.label: FrameLabelExtra
